item.description: Questions I'm still thinking about: Should developing countries go straight to using renewable energy sources, and leapfrog coal and other non-renewables? How do I balance managing the enormous amount of information I could be consuming around me at any given moment with actually actioning on the information I have already? i.e. How do I re-balance my information-action ratio? It is very hard to change a city. But, I believe there are transportation methods we haven't conceived of yet that will benefit from restructurings of cities.

These are the values and principles of my life that my subconscious mind has repeated so often that my conscious mind could finally notice and codify them. Values/Principles Creation is everything. I must always be changing and never preserving. I would die for my friends. Love is the most powerful emotion in the world - I will promote love. Stagnation is death. Behavior = f(character, environment). Corollary: Don't immediately assume the worst in others.
